text: Jeffrey Mark Robinson (December 14, 1961 â€“ October 26, 2014) was an American professional baseball player. He played pitcher in the Major Leagues from 1987 to 1992. Robinson pitched for the Baltimore Orioles, Pittsburgh Pirates, Texas Rangers and Detroit Tigers. Robinson died in Overland Park, Kansas from a short-illness, aged 52. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Baseball players from California Category:Baltimore Orioles players Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:Texas Rangers players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:People from Ventura, California
title: Jeff Robinson (starting pitcher)
